messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/19/03 09:43:26 PM Central Daylight Time, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes: Had to share. ~Kelly, mom of a new reader! ################### Isn t
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/19/03 09:43:26 PM Central Daylight Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:
Had to share.

~Kelly, mom of a new reader!
###################

Isn't that GREAT!!! I'm so happy for your son! Were you just jumping up and
down with joy? :o)

~Nancy

He felt that his whole life was some kind of dream and he sometimes wondered
whose it was and whether they were enjoying it.
Douglas Adams


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Seemingly Off Topic between breastfeeding and pre...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/19/03 7:43:26 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... That s awesome Kelly!!! Congrats to you and your child. Rhonda [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/19/03 7:43:26 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> Suddenly ALL the pieces fit! It's so cool! And we haven't read in WEEKS!
> Busy
> with the conference, all summer in the pool, new video games, travelling
> here
> and there. We take this long hiatus from reading.....and he can read!
>
> Had to share.
>
> ~Kelly, mom of a new reader!
>

That's awesome Kelly!!! Congrats to you and your child.

Rhonda
